001    package ca.hullabaloo.util.cache;
002    
003    /**
004     * A default implementation for {@link Cache.Entry}. Extensions to this class
005     * should be sure to call {@link #setValue(Object)} so that
006     * {@link #lastModified()} is kept up-to-date.
007     * 
008     * @author Darren Gilroy
009     */
010    public class DefaultCacheEntry implements Cache.Entry {
011            private final Object m_key;
012    
013            private Object m_val;
014    
015            private long m_lastModified;
016    
017            /**
018             * Creates a new DefaultCacheEntry object.
019             * 
020             * @param key
021             * 
022             * @throws NullPointerException
023             */
024            public DefaultCacheEntry(Object key) {
025                    if (key == null) {
026                            throw new NullPointerException("Null keys are not supported");
027                    }
028    
029                    m_key = key;
030            }
031    
032            /**
033             * Creates a new DefaultCacheEntry object.
034             * 
035             * @param key
036             * @param value
037             */
038            public DefaultCacheEntry(Object key, Object value) {
039                    this(key);
040                    setValue(value);
041            }
042    
043            /**
044             * Sets the last modified time, without changing the value
045             * 
046             * @param mod
047             *            modified time
048             */
049            public void setLastModified(long mod) {
050                    m_lastModified = mod;
051            }
052    
053            /**
054             * @see Cache.Entry#setValue(java.lang.Object)
055             */
056            public void setValue(Object val) {
057                    m_val = val;
058                    m_lastModified = System.currentTimeMillis();
059            }
060    
061            /**
062             * @see Cache.Entry#key()
063             */
064            public Object key() {
065                    return m_key;
066            }
067    
068            /**
069             * @see Cache.Entry#lastModified()
070             */
071            public long lastModified() {
072                    return m_lastModified;
073            }
074    
075            /**
076             * Since the values are held as SoftReferences, the value may return NULL.
077             * 
078             * @see Cache.Entry#value()
079             */
080            public Object value() {
081                    return m_val;
082            }
083    
084            /**
085             * Sets the last modified time to the current time.
086             */
087            protected void setLastModified() {
088                    m_lastModified = System.currentTimeMillis();
089            }
090    }
